item.title: SQ
item.description: score:-8 Chances: Goldman Sachs predicts that innovation and growth will drive success for companies like Block, Inc. Cash App and Square are steadily recovering after recent outages, indicating resilience in payment services. Positive mentions by Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest may attract investor interest and support SQ stock.

item.title: NU
